en: As long as we protect the environment, it's sustainable.
As long as it's quiet, attend the funeral.
As long as there's time, enjoy your hobbies.
As long as you care for animals, live on a farm.

ko: 공부를 열심히 하는 한, 학교에서 성공해요.
en: As long as you study hard, succeed at school.

ko: 요리 잘 할 테니 같이 먹어요.
en: I'll cook well, so let's eat together.
You'll arrive soon, so please wait.
The art gallery will be great, so let's go.
The bus will be late, so let's take a taxi.
The hobby will be fun, so let's do it together.
